lines.text:
[addressing the church's congregation]
Obey my order and you will not be harmed. Any person who attempts to escape or communicate with the outside world will be shot!
You ask me to bow down to the forces of evil here in this House of God?
I ask nothing! I give you my orders!
I am a minister of the Christian faith. I will take no orders from those who are the enemies and oppressors of mankind!
Babies on bayonets? What would be the advantage?

[looking at a grave marker for the dead German invaders]
Yes, that 's the only bit of England they got!
Yeah, it's summing what the Wops ain't got.

[after witnessing one of the "Royal Engineers" abuse an inquisitive boy]
Oh, you great beast! You great bullying brute you, knocking a child about! You're a disgrace to your uniform! Why, you're no better than a German, - that's what you are!
